title: எப்போது நாம் உணரப்போகிறோம் | When will we realize?
description:
Two-year-old Sujith Wilson is not the only child to have met with a tragic end after falling into an abandoned borewell as at least 10 other children had died in a similar manner in Tamil Nadu over the past 15 years.

The toddler's death brought to the fore the lack of awareness on sealing unused borewells and public apathy towards taking safety measures. Unexplicably, April 2014 saw repeat incidents of innocent children becoming victims of uncovered borewells in the state.
